title: Steelers - Ravens recap & Week 2 preview
itunes:title: Steelers - Ravens recap & Week 2 preview
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- recap the Ravens 26-6 win over the Steelers and preview the remaining 15 games in Week 2. Plus, Gregg makes his "Go Get My Lunch" propositions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
